title: Screensaver Factory 6.5.0.60 + Patch [SWEG].rar
description:
Includes the Blumentals Screensaver Factory v6.5.0.60 installation package, a patch and a text file containing instructions.

Install as usual. After installation use the provided patch. Then use anything, even your nickname, as a serial number to register the program. Done! Enjoy!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------



With Screensaver Factory you can create stunning professional screensavers within minutes. Make screensavers from images, video and flash animation, add background music and smooth sprite and transition effects. Screensaver Factory is very easy to use, and it enables you to make standalone self-installing screensaver files and CDs for easy setup and distribution.


FEATURES:

-Create screensavers from popular image and video formats
-Create screensavers from SWF Flash animation files
-Create trial screensavers that can be unlocked using a license key
-Wizard feature for easy screensaver creation
-Advanced editor for detailed customization
-Over 100 transition effects
-Exclusive slide-and-zoom movement effects
-Easily add text labels to your screensavers
-Create self-installing setup files and CDs
-Add music or sound effects to your creation
-Ability to add clocks/calendars to screensaver
-Create screensavers that display content from RSS feeds
-Add bouncing or moving objects, such as falling snow or rising bubbles
